hero.title: In your size
hero.description: Siz3r is an innovative technological platform supporting clothing purchases on e-commerce platforms.

block1.title: Industries and applications
block1.description: Siz3r is used in various industries, such as e-commerce, traditional stores, fitness, dietetics and entertainment. Our solutions help increase competitiveness, reduce costs and reduce the number of product returns.

block2.title: Innovative solutions
block2.description:
By creating a dimensioned 3D model of the customer's body, Siz3r recommends the best-fitting clothes from the sellers' offer. 

Our platform also allows you to visualize the customer in selected outfits in the form of three-dimensional models, which helps you make the right choice

block3.title: Siz3r products and main product capabilities
block3.description: By creating a 3D model of the customer's body, Siz3r recommends the best-fitting clothes from sellers.
